Method Detail

setEndTimestamp

public static void setEndTimestamp(long timestamp)
This method sets the END timestamp. Both the START and END timestamps have to be set for this activity to start properly.

Parameters:
timestamp - The END timestamp.

setStartTimestamp

public static void setStartTimestamp(long timestamp)
This method sets the START timestamp. Both the START and END timestamps have to be set for this activity to start properly.

Parameters:
timestamp - The START timestamp.

setValues

protected static void setValues(float[] values,
                                int[] activities)
This method sets up the array of floats for the magnitude values. This method has to be called before the activity starts or else it doesn't start.

Parameters:
values - The set of magnitude values required for this graph.

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle icicle)
This method is called when the activity is first created. This method is only called when data points are available.

onDestroy

public void onDestroy()
This method gets called when this activity is no longer needed.
